paragraph: Taiga Nakano (仲野 太賀, Nakano Taiga, born February 7, 1993, in Tokyo, Japan) is a Japanese actor. He is represented with Stardust Promotion. He is the second son of actor Hideo Nakano. He was previously credited as only Taiga.
6th Tama Film Awards Best Emerging Actor Award (Hotori no Sakuko, Daily Lives of High School Boys, Jinrō Game, Monsterz, My Man, Sweet Poolside)
38th Yokohama Film Festival: Best Newcomer (Destruction Babies)
76th Mainichi Film Awards: Best Supporting Actor (Under the Open Sky)
46th Elan d'or Awards: Newcomer of the Year
